sources.name: Excel1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Excel1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared Excel1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://ducal.blob.core.windows.net/test/RaportExchangeMDRCzerwiec2021.xlsx"),
  Excel = Excel.Workbook(AdfDoc),
  ExcelSheet = Excel{[Item = "RaportExchangeMDRCzerwiec2021", Kind = "Sheet"]}[Data]
in
  ExcelSheet;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = Excel1,
  #"Removed top rows" = Table.Skip(Source, 1),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Removed top rows", {{"Column1", Order.Ascending}}),
  #"Uppercased text" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Sorted rows", {{"Column1", each Text.Upper(_), type text}}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Uppercased text", each Text.Contains([Column1], "BAR")),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Filtered rows", {{"Column1", "email"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
